amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? LIMITATION ON ASSISTANCE FOR THE WESTERN HEMISPHERE INSTITUTE FOR SECURITY COOPERATION ? SEC. . None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for programs at the Western Hemisphere Institute for Security Cooperation located at Fort Benning, Georgia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide a limitation on the use funds for programs at the Western Hemisphere Institute for Security cooperation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 218 (Roll no. 243).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. McGovern.
